about_the_game:
BUSINESS EMPIRE is a 4X turn-based strategy game that puts you in charge of an ever-expanding company. Design your own products and market them to the masses, set up distribution routes, and develop new technologies.

You are offered a high degree of freedom to manage your business, including who you hire and where to set up new buildings. You can even shoot for different victory conditions, such as a monopoly, technological, best sales, or even politicking yourself into the top seat. Success will require tough decisions however, such as choosing which products to invest in and which markets to expand into.

Multiple scenarios are available to play, which allow you to customize your experience to the fullest. In "Sizzle and Serve," you'll start with a small tavern in the 18th century and grow your empire into the 21st. To design award-winning signature dishes, you'll need to develop new technologies and cooking techniques, explore for networking opportunities and hire the right employees to manage your ever-growing business. You can even develop your own scenarios using the same tools as the developers, and share them online through Steam Workshop.

Whether you're a seasoned business veteran or just starting out, Business Empire offers a fun and challenging experience that will keep you coming back for more.

Features

Develop your brand to dominate the charts
Explore the world, discover new landmarks and expand into new markets
Manage your growth, expand to a multinational, or stay small and nimble
Navigate ever-changing consumer demands to stay ahead of the competition
Implement effective marketing strategies to attract new customers
Deal with unexpected events and adapt to changing market conditions
Conquer different scenarios, or design your own and share them online
